descriptionlist.description: This purchase includes ProTube HD! You won't need to pay extra for the iPad version!

br.em: "...saying no to an app like this is like refusing to buy a Lamborghini for a buck and a half."

br.br:
ProTube is one of the most popular Cydia apps, one of the feature richest YouTube application available for iPhone or iPod touch, packing every possible feature in one super intuitive application. Video download, HD streaming, audio download, & lots more, ProTube has it all! You can even watch blocked videos! These are the key features of the ProTube app:
View videos, comment, rate, subscribe, search etc.
Completely control your account (My Videos, Favorites, Inbox...)
HD and SD video downloads (up to 1080p)
Download just the audio of a video in high quality
Super fast loading thanks to the Nitro Javascript engine.
Watch blocked videos!
Enable or disable autoplay
Watch videos in ANY quality between 240p and 1080p.
Import downloaded songs and videos using Bridge
Background Downloads
Share and Manage saved Videos
Saved videos are displayed in a beautiful interface showing size, date, length and a thumbnail
Simultaneous downloads supported, each showing speed, progress, remaining time, total download size and downloaded bytes
ALL banner ads are blocked
Watch videos as they download
AirPlay support
12 Languages!
Much more!

changelog.change:
v1.12.2:
• iOS 10 support
• Fixed download errors
